attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The local council(Vale of Glamorgan) and the Park Owners are desperately trying to move us all from our mobile homes by bringing in a new site license, which is open to amendments, of which both parties are refusing to do, and because of this our homes are at risk. People are being intimidated into taking council properties and selling their homes to the park owners at an abysmal price. Many of these people are elderly and vunerable. Please look on you tube for the cpra video, and facebook to join our group cambrian park residents association.

rejection.details: This is an issue for your local authority. Please contact them in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
